dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each representing a single digit from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
